title: Which is the best coding website for kids (age 6 to 14 years) to learn in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many options like coding blocks junior, white hat junior, Vedantu , campk12 which are providing a platform for kids, I've explored a lot with coding blocks and still doing it so I can easily tell you that coding blocks junior[1] is gonna be the most helpful for kids as many websites are giving some paid courses even for some limited time but Coding Blocks junior is providing it for no cost and also it will be there on their you-tube channel with no limitation, there are some answers on my account regarding that and some important will be coming that might be helpful, so can follow me for more updates. Footnotes[1] Coding Blocks Junior
